name: gemini-cli-mcp
description: VS Code MCP plugin that lets GitHub Copilot orchestrate local Gemini CLI workers for repetitive automation tasks.

scripts.compile: npm run typecheck && npm run bundle
scripts.package: npm run compile && node scripts/clean-dist.mjs && node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('dist',{recursive:true});" && vsce package --out dist/gemini-cli-mcp.vsix

geminiMcp.geminiPath.description: Absolute or PATH-resolvable command for Gemini CLI workers.

geminiMcp.maxWorkers.description: Maximum number of concurrent Gemini CLI worker processes.

geminiMcp.taskCwd.description: Working directory to launch Gemini tasks from (defaults to the first workspace folder).

geminiMcp.maxQueue.description: Maximum queued Gemini worker tasks before rejecting new submissions.

geminiMcp.defaultTimeouts.testsRun.description: Default timeout (ms) for the tests.run tool when none is provided.

geminiMcp.defaultTimeouts.codeAnalyze.description: Default timeout (ms) for the code.analyze tool when none is provided.

geminiMcp.defaultTimeouts.codeFormat.description: Default timeout (ms) for the code.format.batch tool when none is provided.

geminiMcp.defaultTimeouts.taskSubmit.description: Default timeout (ms) for gemini.task.submit jobs (0 disables the timeout).

geminiMcp.defaultPriorities.testsRun.description: Default queue priority for tests.run tasks when the caller omits it.

geminiMcp.defaultPriorities.codeAnalyze.description: Default queue priority for code.analyze tasks when the caller omits it.

geminiMcp.defaultPriorities.codeFormat.description: Default queue priority for code.format.batch tasks when the caller omits it.

geminiMcp.defaultPriorities.taskSubmit.description: Default queue priority for gemini.task.submit tasks when the caller omits it.

geminiMcp.unhealthyStates.description: Which Gemini CLI health states should mark the extension as unhealthy (red). Values can include 'missing', 'quota_exhausted', 'unresponsive', or 'error'. Default includes 'missing','quota_exhausted','unresponsive' so missing CLI, quota exhaustion, or service/unresponsive errors show a red state while other transient warnings do not.

geminiMcp.modelBridge.enabled.description: Enable the HTTP automation bridge so local AI agents (Copilot, Copilot Chat, local models) can submit MCP tool calls programmatically.

geminiMcp.modelBridge.httpPort.description: HTTP port that the automation bridge listens on for POST /call-tool and /orchestrate requests.

geminiMcp.modelBridge.authToken.description: Optional bearer token that incoming automation bridge calls must present via x-gemini-mcp-token or Authorization headers.

geminiMcp.modelBridge.requestTimeoutMs.description: Request timeout (ms) for bridge proxied MCP tool calls. Requests exceeding this will return 504 and attempt cancellation.

geminiMcp.modelBridge.captureSdkMessageI.description: How the extension captures SDK-assigned message ids for observability: 'sdkHook' prefers a stable SDK-provided hook, 'bestEffort' uses transport/protocol wrapping, 'disabled' turns off capture (no overhead).

geminiMcp.modelBridge.allowedTools.description: Whitelist of MCP tools available to automation bridge callers; leave empty to allow all registered tools.

geminiMcp.modelBridge.allowOrchestrator.description: Allow POST /orchestrate so model agents can trigger the orchestrated review workflow. Set to false to restrict the bridge to single-tool calls.
